mapper.select: select count(*) from business_member where id=#{value}
select count(*) from business_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
select id from business_member where name=#{name} and email=#{email}
select id from business_member where id=#{id} and name=#{name} and email=#{email}
mapper.update: update business_member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select 연령대,count(연령대) from (select name, case when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 19 then '10대' when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 29 then '20대' when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 39 then '30대' when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 49 then '40대' else '50대 이상' end as 연령대 from reservation r, client_member c where r.userid = c.id and r.res_name=#{value}) group by 연령대 order by 연령대

select * from (select 국적,count(*),row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) rnum from (select name, case when nation='japan' then '일본' when nation='china' then '중국' when nation='korea' then '한국' when nation='france' then '프랑스' when nation='spain' then '스페인' end as 국적 from (select nation,yearofbirth, id, name from reservation r, client_member c where r.userid = c.id and r.res_name=#{value})) group by 국적) where rnum between 1 and 3

select case when 숫자 =05 then '5월' when 숫자 =06 then '6월' when 숫자 =07 then '7월' when 숫자 =08 then '8월' when 숫자 =09 then '9월' else '기타 월' end as 월, count(*) from (select res_name,substr(res_date,6,2) 숫자 from reservation where res_name=#{value}) group by 숫자 order by 월
